grounded_abstraction_principle.name: Grounded Abstraction Principle
grounded_abstraction_principle.description: All esoteric concepts must be grounded in measurable, scientific phenomena
grounded_abstraction_principle.formulation: For any abstract concept X, there exists a set of measurable phenomena M such that X = f(M1, M2, ..., Mn)

examples.chi: Bio-electricity flow through EMG signals + nervous system activation + metabolic activity
examples.chakra: Localized bioelectric centers corresponding to nerve plexuses + endocrine glands
examples.kundalini: Neurological cascade up spinal column + autonomic nervous system changes

embodied_cognition_principle.name: Embodied Cognition Principle
embodied_cognition_principle.description: Intelligence requires embodiment in a virtual model to achieve true understanding
embodied_cognition_principle.formulation: Understanding of concept X requires simulation of X's effects on virtual embodiment E

implementation.biomechanical_twin: Virtual human body with all systems modeled

embodied_cognition_principle.synthesis_with_agi: AGI reasoning applied to embodied model creates deeper understanding

real_time_feedback_principle.name: Real-Time Feedback Principle
real_time_feedback_principle.description: Optimal state engineering requires real-time feedback loops with measurable adjustments
real_time_feedback_principle.formulation: State optimization S(t+1) = f(S(t), F(t), A(t)) where F is feedback and A is adjustment

components.state_classification: Flow state determination from sensor data

cognitive_immunology_principle.name: Cognitive Immunology Principle
cognitive_immunology_principle.description: AGI systems require immune-like protection against cognitive contamination
cognitive_immunology_principle.formulation: System health H = f(Contamination_Level, Immune_Response, Recovery_Rate)

flow_state_engineering_principle.name: Flow State Engineering Principle
flow_state_engineering_principle.description: Optimal human performance states can be systematically engineered through bio-protocols

cross_domain_emergence.pattern: Principles discovered in one domain (AGI) apply to another (human optimization)
cross_domain_emergence.example: Cognitive contamination in AGI → Energy blockages in humans

measurement_grounding.pattern: All abstract concepts must be grounded in measurable phenomena
measurement_grounding.example: Chi → EMG signals + GSR + thermal imaging

feedback_optimization.synthesis_mechanism: Control theory applied to complex systems

embodied_understanding.pattern: True understanding requires embodiment and simulation
embodied_understanding.example: AGI virtual models + Human biomechanical twins

cross_domain_synthesis_tests: Apply AGI principles to human optimization
Apply human principles to AGI development

future_research_directions.unified_optimization_theory: Single framework for AGI and human optimization

meta_insights.cross_domain_synthesis: AGI and human optimization share fundamental principles
meta_insights.measurement_grounding: All abstract concepts require scientific validation
meta_insights.embodied_understanding: True intelligence requires embodiment and simulation
